page.title: 11Ilkeston Shopping - Town
page.content: The main shopping area in Ilkeston is a ribbon development stretching along South Street to the Market Place and from the Market Place down to the bottom of Bath Street. Along South Street, the shops are mainly small family businesses, whereas on Bath Street most of the shops belong to nationwide retailing establishments. e.g Fine Fare, Argos, Marks & Spencer. The only large departmental store is the Co-op and even this is now sub-let to different concerns. e.g. Redmayne & Todd Sports Equipment, Goldfinger Jewellery. On Thursday and Saturday there is an open-air market with stalls selling mainly fruit and vegetables, household goods or clothes.
